TopicTitle: BDFPS problems (is this mod up to date?)

Articles.Content: So BeardyPenguin got the BDFPS mod working but I cant seem to get it to get along with KIS. Should I put the BDFPS files in the KIS folder or something? My main problem is that the BDFPS work with the inventory and attachment system, but not equipping stuff? If anybody has an answer to y question, please say so.
